verbs.description: russia fires back after [ARG0: trump] [V: threatens] [ARG1: to ditch nuclear arms treaty] the russian government has said it would be forced to take measures if the united states began developing new missile systems ratcheting up the rhetoric after us president donald trump said he would ditch a cold war - era nuclear arms treaty russian government trump mikhail gorbachev moscow government of russia ria novosti united states asia vladimir putin president ronald reagan president intermediate - range nuclear forces treaty soviet union donald trump dmitry peskov official us intermediate range nuclear forces treaty nikolai patrushev nato president donald trump russia
